description: The SportsJS Soccer schema contains properties common to Ice Hockey.

iceHockeyEventMetadata.description: Metadata about the event itself. | Specific to ice-hockey.

iceHockeyPlayerMetadata.description: Metadata for a player. | Specific to ice-hockey.

shootingHand.description: The side from which a player normally shoots.

catchingHand.description: The hand with which a player, generally a goaltender, catches the puck.

iceHockeyTeamStats.description: Stats about one team. | Specific to ice-hockey.

iceHockeyPlayerStats.description: Stats for a player specific to ice-hockey. | Includes the same offensive and defensive stats available for a team.

minutesPlayed.description: Number of minutes player was on ice.

baseIceHockeyStats.description: Stats for a player specific to ice-hockey. | Includes the same offensive and defensive stats available for a team.

plusMinus.description: Number of times team/player was on ice when own team scored minus the number of times team/player was on ice when opponent scored.

plusTotal.description: Number of team/times player was on ice when own team scored.

minusTotal.description: Number of times tteam/player was on ice when opponent scored.

penaltyMinutes.description: Total number of penalty minutes accrued by a single player or team.

iceHockeyStatsOffensive.description: Offensive stats for one team. | Specific to ice-hockey, including stats on shots, goals, and faceoffs.

goalsTotal.description: Total number of goals by the team. Could differ from the score if score-points are awarded for shootout, for example.

goalsGameWinning.description: Goals that provided the winning margin in a game.

goalsGameTying.description: Goals that caused the game to be tied.

goalsPowerPlay.description: Goals scored while the team was having a power-play.

goalsShortHanded.description: Goals scored while the team was playing short-handed.

goalsEvenStrength.description: Goals scored while the teams were at even strength.

goalsEmptyNet.description: Goals scored on an empty goal, with the opposing goalie pulled from the net.

goalsPerGame.description: Average of goals scored per game.

assistsPowerPlay.description: Total number of assists made during a power play.

assistsShortHanded.description: Total number of assists made while short-handed.

assistsGameWinning.description: Assists on goals that provided the winning margin in a game.

assistsGameTying.description: Assists on goals that caused the game to be tied.

assistsOvertime.description: Assists on goals scored during overtime.

points.description: Total number of points, with a score and an assist generally counted as one point each.

pointsPowerPlay.description: Total number of points during power plays, with a score and an assist generally counted as one point each.

pointsShortHanded.description: Total number of points while short-handed, with a score and an assist generally counted as one point each.

powerPlayAmount.description: Number of power-play opportunities a team has had.

powerPlayPercentage.description: Measure of success at power plays. Figured by dividing goals-power-play by power-play-amount.

shotsPenaltyShotTaken.description: Total number of penalty shots taken by a shooting player.

shotsPenaltyShotMissed.description: Total number of penalty shots missed by a shooting player.

shotsPenaltyShotPercentage.description: Percentage of penalty shots that resulted in goals.

giveaways.description: Number of times that passes were attempted but intercepted. A judgment call whose exact conditions vary.

minutesPowerPlay.description: Total number of minutes played in a power-play.

scoringChances.description: Total number of qualified chances to score.

shotAttemptsBlocked.description: Number of shots taken which were blocked by an opponent.

shotsEvenStrength.description: Number of shots taken at even strength.

shotsPowerPlay.description: Number of shots taken on power play.

shotsShortHanded.description: Number of shots taken while short-handed.

iceHockeyStatsDefensive.description: Defensive stats for the team. | Specific to ice-hockey, including saves and shots allowed.

shotsPowerPlayAllowed.description: Total number of shots on goal allowed during power-play.

shotsPenaltyShotAllowed.description: Total number of shots allowed as penalty-shots.

goalsPowerPlayAllowed.description: Total number of goals allowed while the opposing team has a power-play.

goalsPenaltyShotAllowed.description: Total number of goals allowed as penalty-shots.

goalsEmptyNetAllowed.description: Total number of goals allowed while the net was empty.

goalsShortHandedAllowed.description: Total number of goals allowed while playing short-handed.

goalsAgainstTotal.description: Total number of goals against for the given period. Could differ from the score if score-points are deducted for some reason.

goalsAgainstAverage.description: Average number of goals per game allowed by the team.

savePercentage.description: Percentage of saves compared to total number of shots.

goalsShootoutAllowed.description: Number of shootout goals that went in for a score for the opposing team.

shotsShootoutAllowed.description: Number of shootout shots that were attempted by the opposing team.

penaltyKillingAmount.description: Number of penalty-killing sessions, aka number of short-handed sessions.

shotsBlocked.description: Number of shots that were blocked. This statistic is generally tracked for non-goalies.

takeaways.description: Number of intercepted passes. A judgment call whose exact conditions vary.

shutouts.description: Total number of games where the opposing team did not score.

minutesPenaltyKilling.description: Total number of minutes played short-handed, while the other team had a power-play.

hits.description: Number of body checks made against an opposing player.

goaltenderWins.description: Total number of games with this goaltender.

goaltenderLosses.description: Total number of games lost with this goaltender.

goaltenderTies.description: Total number of games tied with this goaltender.

goaltenderWinsOvertime.description: Number of games won while play is in overtime.

goaltenderLossesOvertime.description: Number of games lost while play is in overtime.

iceHockeyStatsFaceoffs.description: Defensive stats for the team. | Specific to ice-hockey, including saves and shots allowed.

faceoffWinPercentage.description: Percentage of faceoffs that were won.

faceoffsEvenStrengthTotal.description: Number of faceoffs taken at even strength.

faceoffsEvenStrengthWins.description: Number of faceoffs won at even strength.

faceoffsEvenStrengthLosses.description: Number of faceoffs lost at even strength.

faceoffsEvenStrengthWinPercentage.description: Percentage of faceoffs won at even strength.

faceoffsPowerPlayTotal.description: Number of faceoffs taken on power play.

faceoffsPowerPlayWins.description: Number of faceoffs won on power play.

faceoffsPowerPlayLosses.description: Number of faceoffs lost on power play.

faceoffsPowerPlayWinPercentage.description: Percentage of faceoffs won on power play.

faceoffsShortHandedTotal.description: Number of faceoffs taken while short-handed.

faceoffsShortHandedWins.description: Number of faceoffs won while short-handed.

faceoffsShortHandedLosses.description: Number of faceoffs lost while short-handed.

faceoffsShortHandedWinPercentage.description: Percentage of faceoffs won while short-handed.

iceHockeyStatsTimeOnIce.description: Defensive stats for the team. | Specific to ice-hockey, including saves and shots allowed.

timeAveragePerShift.description: Average amount of time played per shift.

timeAverageEvenStrength.description: Average amount of time played at even strength.

timeAverageShortHanded.description: Average amount of time played short-handed.

timeAveragePowerPlay.description: Average amount of time played on power play.

timePowerPlay.description: Amount of time played on power play.

timeEvenStrength.description: Amount of time played at even strength.

timeEmptyNet.description: Amount of time played with an empty net.

timePowerPlayEmptyNet.description: Amount of time played on power play with empty net.

timeShortHandedEmptyNet.description: Amount of time played short-handed with empty net.

timeEvenStrengthEmptyNet.description: Amount of time played even strength with empty net.

powerPlayTimeRemaining.description: The time remaining in the power-play.

powerPlayTeamIdref.description: The key of the team on power-play.

powerPlayPlayerAdvantage.description: The number of extra players on ice for the team on power play.

scoreTeam.description: After an action has taken place, the score of the team that team-idref points to.

scoreTeamOpposing.description: After an action has taken place, the score of the team opposing that listed in team-idref.

playerCount.description: Number of players on the ice for the stat or action.

playerCountOpposing.description: Number of opposing players on the ice for the stat or action.

zone.description: The zone on the rink for the stat or action: offensive | defensive | neutral.

location.description: Location of the action on the rink.
